DOC.criteria: Male , Female , age 1865 , ethnic group History inflammatory myelopathy onset least 3 month prior No FES ergometer ( i.e . RT300 equivalent ) use within 1 month Subject medically stable , recent ( 1 month less ) inpatient admission acute medical surgical issue Subject legally able make health care decision Access telephone texting capability English language proficiency Cardiovascular disease define previous myocardial infarction , unstable angina , requirement anti platelet agent , congestive heart failure , stroke NYHA Class III IV , history arrhythmia hemodynamic instability .
